text: @StateDept @SecPompeo .@SecPompeo on #Iran and #COVID19: If they truly cared about their people, they’d behave in a way that is fundamentally different. It’s what we’ve been trying to get them to do for our three years in office, and I’m convinced we’re on the right path to deny them their resources.
